text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Then do it. Quit lying and trying to message the coronavirus and actually handle it. 

If you had done something (ramped up testing, made ventilators) in JANUARY when you knew something, a lot of people would be alive today. #INCOMPETENCEKILLS #IncompetentInChief @thehill
